about_the_game:
An "accident" has caused you, who are about to graduate from university, to lose some important memories, including important events, important people, and a significant portion of your vocabulary. In urgent need of improving your vocabulary to meet the requirements of your future job, you joined an experimental project called the "Ten Thousand Words Club." There, you encountered three women whose destinies are intertwined with yours.

Gameplay Overview:

You need to choose a vocabulary book and set your own study plan, including learning methods, the number of new words and reviews per day, and more. After completing these learning tasks, you can earn virtual currency rewards, increase the teaching assistants' affection levels, and unlock new storylines.

* After completing the daily study plan, you can choose to continue working or battling in the virtual world to earn virtual currency and experience points, or you can improve your attributes by working with a fitness trainer. Whether it's "working," "battling," or "working out," all are vocabulary mini-games with a review function. While playing the game, you also enhance your mastery of previously learned words.

* The development of the storyline will change based on the affection levels of the teaching assistants and your choices. To pursue the teaching assistant you like, you need to select her as your current teaching assistant, complete learning tasks according to your set plan, and earn virtual currency to buy her gifts.

* The main antagonist in the game also has his eyes on these three beautiful teaching assistants, considering you as his rival. He will occasionally challenge you with word challenges. Defeat him, and you'll receive substantial rewards!

Game Features:

* Multiple motivational factors: The presence of virtual teaching assistants, cultivating word girlfriends, exploring multiple endings, facing challenges from the antagonist, rewards from vocabulary mini-games, a rich achievement system, and more. Each aspect of the game is designed to provide you with continuous motivation to learn vocabulary.

* More scientific, user-friendly, and personalized learning methods: We understand the drawbacks of traditional vocabulary learning methods. We have made vocabulary learning more dynamic and moderately intense to reduce user frustration and drowsiness. We prioritize the user learning experience and do not mindlessly recommend vocabulary words that exceed the user's learning capacity. We offer multiple learning methods, allowing users to customize their learning based on their actual situations and make adjustments at any time.

* High-quality production: Full voice acting by real actors, 30+ beautifully hand-drawn storyline CGs (including dynamic CGs), several well-crafted original theme songs, and ending songs.

* Immersive experience: In the game, you play as a character in a virtual small town, seamlessly integrating learning segments and game exploration. The virtual town has day, evening, and night cycles, allowing you to freely explore, make friends, trade, initiate side quests, engage in word battles, and immerse yourself deeply into the game.

With this game, we offer an exciting adventure that transforms word learning into an enjoyable and rewarding experience. Join us now to explore the joy of English learning in this visually immersive game!
